inclusion.criterion: histologically confirmed locally advanced stage (IIIB) or metastatic (IV) non-small cell lung cancer with disease progression
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: treated with Nivolumab as second or more therapeutic line
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: in the oncologic department university hospital of Brest
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: primary tumor was not from bronchopulmonary origin
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: history of total thyroidectomy and/or having previously treated with levothyroxine and/or having a thyroid dysfunction previously to the introduction of Nivolumab
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: no thyroid monitoring during Nivolumab treatment, and data were missing
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: opposition to participate in the study
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has Hashimoto's thyroiditis, but was treated with Levothyroxine and showed improvement. No history of total thyroidectomy or previous thyroid dysfunction.
